projects.name: wyattsweet.com
projects.description: My personal site where I'm collecting information on projects I'm working on and writing about topics I'm interested in.

projects.name: thredUP
projects.description: As a Software Engineer at thredUP, I worked on the UI for the company's main site. I worked as part of a fast paced, cross-functional team developing on our large scale, heavily trafficked React/Redux app. I built new features and maintained existing ones. In addition to building new features, I was responsible for fixing cross-browser, cross-device UI bugs and I refactored large sections of legacy code.

projects.name: Salesforce
projects.description: At Salesforce, I built and worked on a number of full-stack applications for both internal and external use. I wrote custom ruby code to help customers migrate their data over to the desk.com platform. I solved a variety of technical issues related to front and back end code and I utilized HTML, CSS and JavaScript to customize Desk support centers for large clients.

projects.name: General Assembly
projects.description: Student in web development immersive program, a 12-week immersive full-time program that prepares students to become full stack web developers. I learned programming fundamentals, front-end development, back-end development, working with teams and product development.
